participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

upps6_y.Description: I like to stop and think about things before I do it. | 4 = Not at all like me; 3 = Not like me; 2 = Somewhat like me; 1 = Very much like me

upps7_y.Description: When I feel bad, I often do things I later regret in order to make myself feel better now. | 1 = Not at all like me; 2 = Not like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 4 = Very much like me

upps11_y.Description: Sometimes when I feel bad, I keep doing something even though it is making me feel worse. | 1 = Not at all like me; 2 = Not like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 4 = Very much like me

upps12_y.Description: I enjoy taking risks. | 1 = Not at all like me; 2 = Not like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 4 = Very much like me

upps15_y.Description: I finish what I start. | 4 = Not at all like me; 3 = Not like me; 2 = Somewhat like me; 1 = Very much like me

upps16_y.Description: I try to take a careful approach to things. | 4 = Not at all like me; 3 = Not like me; 2 = Somewhat like me; 1 = Very much like me

upps17_y.Description: When I am upset I often act without thinking. | 1 = Not at all like me; 2 = Not like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 4 = Very much like me

upps18_y.Description: I like new, thrilling things, even if they are a little scary. | 1 = Not at all like me; 2 = Not like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 4 = Very much like me

upps19_y.Description: I tend to get things done on time. | 4 = Not at all like me; 3 = Not like me; 2 = Somewhat like me; 1 = Very much like me

upps20_y.Description: When I feel rejected, I often say things that I later regret. | 1 = Not at all like me; 2 = Not like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 4 = Very much like me

upps21_y.Description: I would like to learn to fly an airplane. | 1 = Not at all like me; 2 = Not like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 4 = Very much like me

upps22_y.Description: I am a person who always gets the job done. | 4 = Not at all like me; 3 = Not like me; 2 = Somewhat like me; 1 = Very much like me

upps23_y.Description: I am very careful. | 4 = Not at all like me; 3 = Not like me; 2 = Somewhat like me; 1 = Very much like me

upps24_y.Description: I almost always finish projects that I start. | 4 = Not at all like me; 3 = Not like me; 2 = Somewhat like me; 1 = Very much like me

upps27_y.Description: I would like to ski very fast down a high mountain slope. | 1 = Not at all like me; 2 = Not like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 4 = Very much like me

upps28_y.Description: I tend to stop and think before doing things. | 4 = Not at all like me; 3 = Not like me; 2 = Somewhat like me; 1 = Very much like me

upps35_y.Description: When I am in a great mood, I tend to do things that can cause me problems. | 1 = Not at all like me; 2 = Not like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 4 = Very much like me

upps36_y.Description: I tend to act without thinking when I am very, very happy. | 1 = Not at all like me; 2 = Not like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 4 = Very much like me

upps37_y.Description: When I get really happy about something, I tend to do things that can lead to trouble. | 1 = Not at all like me; 2 = Not like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 4 = Very much like me

upps39_y.Description: I tend to lose control when I am in a great mood. | 1 = Not at all like me; 2 = Not like me; 3 = Somewhat like me; 4 = Very much like me

upps_y_ss_negative_urgency.Description: UPPS-P for Children Short Form (ABCD-version), Negative Urgency: upps7_y + upps11_y + upps17_y +  upps20_y; Validation: Minimum of three items answered | Barch, D. M.,  Albaugh, M.D., et al. (2017)  Demographic, physical and mental health assessments in the adolescent brain and cognitive development study: Rationale and description. Dev Cogn Neurosci (In Press).

upps_y_ss_negative_urgency_nm.Description: UPPS-P for Children Short Form (ABCD-version), Negative Urgency:  Number Missing Answers

upps_y_ss_negative_urgency_nt.Description: UPPS-P for Children Short Form (ABCD-version), Negative Urgency:  Number Total Questions

upps_y_ss_lack_of_planning.Description: UPPS-P for Children Short Form (ABCD-version),  Lack of Planning: upps6_y + upps16_y + upps23_y + upps28_y; Validation: Minimum of three items answered | Barch, D. M.,  Albaugh, M.D., et al. (2017)  Demographic, physical and mental health assessments in the adolescent brain and cognitive development study: Rationale and description. Dev Cogn Neurosci (In Press).

upps_y_ss_lack_of_planning_nm.Description: UPPS-P for Children Short Form (ABCD-version), Lack of Planning:  Number Missing Answers

upps_y_ss_lack_of_planning_nt.Description: UPPS-P for Children Short Form (ABCD-version), Lack of Planning:  Number Total Questions

upps_y_ss_sensation_seeking.Description: UPPS-P for Children Short Form (ABCD-version), Sensation Seeking: upps12_y + upps18_y + upps21_y + upps27_y; Validation: Minimum of three items answered | Barch, D. M.,  Albaugh, M.D., et al. (2017)  Demographic, physical and mental health assessments in the adolescent brain and cognitive development study: Rationale and description. Dev Cogn Neurosci (In Press).

upps_y_ss_sensation_seeking_nm.Description: UPPS-P for Children Short Form (ABCD-version), Sensation Seeking:  Number Missing Answers

upps_y_ss_sensation_seeking_nt.Description: UPPS-P for Children Short Form (ABCD-version), Sensation Seeking:  Number Total Questions

upps_y_ss_positive_urgency.Description: UPPS-P for Children Short Form (ABCD-version), Positive Urgency: upps35_y + upps36_y + upps37_y + upps39_y; Validation: Minimum of three items answered | Barch, D. M.,  Albaugh, M.D., et al. (2017)  Demographic, physical and mental health assessments in the adolescent brain and cognitive development study: Rationale and description. Dev Cogn Neurosci (In Press).

upps_y_ss_positive_urgency_nm.Description: UPPS-P for Children Short Form (ABCD-version), Positive Urgency:  Number Missing Answers

upps_y_ss_positive_urgency_nt.Description: UPPS-P for Children Short Form (ABCD-version), Positive Urgency:  Number Total Questions

upps_y_ss_lack_of_perseverance.Description:
UPPS: Lack of Perseverance (GSSF)
upps15_y plus upps19_y plus upps22_y plus upps24_y
Validation : Minimum of three items answered

UPPS: Lack of Perseverance (GSSF)
Number Missing Answers
